message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CY. 

The paper proposes a framework for answer generation for product-related questions in E-commerce using review snippets. This involves natural language processing and machine learning techniques, which are commonly associated with the sub-categories of computational linguistics (cs.CL), information retrieval (cs.IR), machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), and computer vision and pattern recognition (cs.CY). However, since the paper focuses on natural language processing and machine learning, the first three sub-categories are more likely than the last two.
